schools.name: Iowa State University
schools.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering, Minor in Data Science
paragraphs: Gained expertise in software development, data analytics, and agile project management, including leading multiple app development projects from concept through delivery.
Developed strong foundations in product management methodologies by collaborating on interdisciplinary teams to build full-stack mobile and web applications.

certifications.title: High Impact Presentation Certification
paragraphs: Enhanced presentation and stakeholder communication skills, focusing on delivering clear, persuasive messaging to technical and non-technical audiences.
Learned advanced techniques for creating engaging presentations, driving stakeholder alignment, and effectively communicating complex project roadmaps.

certifications.title: AI for Product Management Certification
certifications.alt: Mind the Product - AI for Product Management
paragraphs: Gained comprehensive understanding of AI technologies and their strategic implementation in product development and management.
Developed expertise in evaluating AI opportunities, managing AI-driven features, and making data-informed product decisions.
